a4_assignment Documentation

a4_assignment

pfms A4 Assingment

  • Homepage: http://wiki.ros.org/a4_assignment

a4_assingment is a package prepared for the subject Programming for Mechatronics Systems (PfMS) to deliver the final inidividual project, i.e. Robot Trajectory Follower.

Usage: To setup the trajectory following system, execute the following commands in a new terminal

launch stage simulator
$ roslaunch a4_setup a4_setup.launch

launch rviz
$ rviz -d $(rospack find a4_setup)/rviz/pfms.rviz

run sample node to launch 'face_goal' server
$ rosrun a4_assignment a4_assignment-sample

run path follower assistance node
$ rosrun pfms_path_following pfms_path_following-velocity_control

run main node to begin path following task
$ rosrun a4_assignment follow_traj_main_node _mode

or for advance mode, pass in a boolean via the _advance parameter

$ rosrun a4_assignment follow_traj_main_node _mode _advance:=true

Unit-testing

To run the unit testing:
$ cd ~/catkin_ws
$ catkin_make tests
$ rosrun a4_assignment a4_assignment-test-hd

Doxygen

To begin, navigate to the workspace:
$ cd ~/catkin_ws

To generate the Documentations
$ rosdoc_lite src/a4_assignment

To view the Documentation
$ firefox ~/catkin_ws/doc/html/index.html
